Posts.Content: Hi kaytee, I think it's usually around 6 weeks if all your wounds have healed. Mine was a little longer as I got an infection , my onc dept rang me with appt 10 days before I started chemo, hope all goes well Sue
Posts.Title: If you had mastectomy followed by chemo...

Posts.Content: I had to take these injections for the first 7 days after each session of chemo and at day 6 of each I would be in total agony, like I'd trapped nerves, I used to take liquid morphine to cope, that really helped. Good luck on treatment
Posts.Title: Pain following Neulasta injection
